entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,TResult> #75845
  • Sex #75843
  • Extra calls in Asm #75842

Closed

  • Analyzer to simplify LINQ expressions by using an overload that accepts a Func<TSource,Boolean> #75844
  • Long-running IAsyncEnumerable<T> leaks the last seen enumerated value. #74013
    Backlog
  • Type name of EditorFeaturesOnTheFlyDocsElement appears at the end of QuickInfo in Razor component #75106
    17.13 P2
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35508.20 #75840

PullRequests

Created

  • Create features/DictionaryExpression branch and resurrect parsing for those expressions #75846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Use `IsManagedType` for determining which state machine hoisted locals to clear #75841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bail out of on-the-fly-docs for razor documents #75818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix source-generator reload when in 'balanced' mode #75831
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, 17.13
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
